wordcloud
==========

Dependencies
--------------

**Install wordcloud (linux)** 

.. code-block:: bash

    conda install -c amueller wordcloud=1.3.1


**Install wordcloud (Windows)** 

.. code-block:: python

    # Download from: 
    # http://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/#wordcloud
    pip install wordcloud‑1.3.1‑cp35‑cp35m‑win_amd64.whl


Example
--------
